Name:
USS McCook
HMCS St. Croix
Namesake:
Roderick S. McCook
St. Croix River
Builder: Bethlehem Shipbuilding Corporation, Fore River Shipyard, Quincy
Fate:
Transferred to the United Kingdom then Canada, 24 September 1940
Torpedoed and sunk by U-305, 20 September 1943
Armament:
4 x 4 in (102 mm) guns
2 x 3 in (76 mm) guns
12 x 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
